title: Lab Slides
text:
Summary

Quarto integrates text and code

Reveal.js creates presentations

Citations work with BibTeX



Code
# This code cell will be foldable in reveal.js

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 10, 200)
y = np.cos(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
plt.plot(x, y, label="cos(x)")
plt.title("Cosine Function")
plt.legend()
plt.show()







Gelman, Andrew, John B Carlin, Hal S Stern, and Donald B Rubin. 1995. Bayesian Data Analysis. Chapman; Hall/CRC.
